metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3517 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in the minimatch package. This flaw allows a Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) when calling the braceExpand function with specific arguments, resulting in a Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: node-minimatch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
